sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO T_SYS_XTSQ (XTSQID, XTYHID, XTMKID) VALUES (#XTSQID#, #XTYHID#, #XTMKID#)
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.XTSQID, A.XTMKID, B.MKBH, B.MKMC, C.YHM FROM T_SYS_XTSQ A LEFT JOIN T_SYS_XTMK B ON A.XTMKID = B.XTMKID LEFT JOIN T_SYS_XTYH C ON A.XTYHID = C.XTYHID WHERE A.XTYHID=#XTYHID# ORDER BY MKBH
